text: Janakeeyam is a 2003 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Raj Ganesh, starring Saikumar and Anju in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Majeed * Prathapachandran as Prathapan * Anju as Usha * Thalapathi Dinesh as Majeed Khan * Nisha Chowdhary as Mary * Rajaganesh as Surya * Saikumar as Ravi * Santhakumari as Ravi's mother *Keerikkadan Jose as DSP Mohandas *Santha Devi as Lakshmiyamma *P. R. Varalakshmi as Surya's mother ==References== ==External links== * Category:2003 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Janakeeyam
